title: Dragon robe
description: Court robe of dark blue k\'ossu with nine 5-clawed dragons in gold.  In ground loosely-drawn clouds, bats, Buddhist and Taoist emblems, and peonies in shades of red, rose, green, blue, yellow, olive-green, and soft violet.  Rather deep conventional border with slightly wavy slanting stripes, tight clouds, swastikas, coral, Buddhist, Taoist and cash symbols.  Below border on sleeve a strip of stiped black and gold brocaded satin.  Cuffs and collar band of dark blue k\'ossu edged with black and gold fret-work brocade.  Painted details.  Robe slit back and front and lined with blue raw silk.  K\'ossu of firm quality except in dragon areas.  Inscription in front.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
